itunes:title: Episode 535 - The Octopus Challenge
title: Episode 535 - The Octopus Challenge
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the Octopus Challenge, which is a legend among all octopi, where the male is able to break off his penis and regrow it at a later time.  The question is whether or not you would do it to get out of one night stands...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the Octopus Challenge, which is a legend among all octopi, where the male is able to break off his penis and regrow it at a later time.  The question is whether or not you would do it to get out of one night stands or bad relationships?  How long would you be able to sacrifice your own penis or would you do so at all?
